hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SWARM_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Host address of the instance that the swarm master is running on

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
DOCKER_CMD="docker -H tcp://${SWARM_HOST}:2375"
# start postgres ${DOCKER_CMD} run -d --restart=always -p 5432:5432 --name postgres -e POSTGRES_USER=demo -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=demo postgres:latest
